bib.title: First Retrievals of ASCAT IB VOD (Vegetation Optical Depth) at Global Scale
bib.citation: 2021 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium IGARSS, 6403 …, 2021
bib.author: Xiangzhuo Liu and J-P Wigneron and Frédéric Frappart and Nicolas Baghdadi and Mehrez Zribi and Thomas Jagdhuber and Philippe Ciais and Xiaojun Li and Mengjia Wang and Lei Fan and Bertrand Ygorra and Hongliang Ma and Zanpin Xing and Amen Al-Yaari and Roberto Fernandez-Moran and Christophe Moisy
bib.conference: 2021 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium IGARSS
bib.abstract: Global and long-term vegetation optical depth (VOD) dataset are very useful to monitor the dynamics of the vegetation features, climate and environmental changes. In this study, the radar-based global ASCAT (Advanced SCATterometer) IB (INRAE-BORDEAUX) VOD was retrieved using a model which was recently calibrated over Africa. In order to assess the performance of IB VOD, the Saatchi biomass and three other VOD datasets (ASCAT V16, AMSR2 LPRM V5 and VODCA LPRM V6) derived from C-band observations were used in the comparison. The preliminary results show that IB VOD has a promising ability to predict biomass   , which is better than V16 VOD    and VODCA VOD   . Some retrieval issues for IB VOD were found in boreal regions (e.g., Eastern America, Russia). In the future, we will focus on improving …
